original: “Atthi pana, bhante, buddhassa upasampadā, udāhu natthī”ti?
“Upasampanno kho, mahārāja, bhagavā bodhirukkhamūle saha sabbaññutañāṇena, natthi
analyzed: ▁upasampann o ▁kho ▁mahārāja ▁bhagavā ▁bodhi rukkh amūl e ▁saha ▁sabbaññut añāṇ ena ▁natthi

original: bhagavato upasampadā aññehi dinnā, yathā sāvakānaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavā sikkhāpadaṁ
